data.text:
Shop Ivrea - Your Name #1 Al #3 - Serie Completa Nuevo!! and more Libros Físicos at Latinafy.com

Your Name - Complete Series Set - Brand New!!

Escape to the enchanting world of "Your Name" with this captivating manga series box set by acclaimed author Makoto Shinkai and talented illustrator Ranmaru Kotone. Dive into the mesmerizing tale of Mitsuha Miyamizu, a high school girl living in a secluded mountain village who yearns for a different life in bustling Tokyo. Her wish takes an unexpected turn when she finds herself swapping bodies with Taki Tachibana, a Tokyo high school boy. What starts as a dreamlike occurrence soon unfolds into a profound connection that transcends mere fantasy.

Serialized in the esteemed Monthly Comic Alive magazine, this manga adaptation breathes new life into the beloved animated film "Your Name," directed by the masterful Makoto Shinkai. Immerse yourself in the beautifully illustrated pages inspired by the blockbuster movie that captured hearts worldwide. Ranmaru Kotone's artistic prowess, showcased in previous manga works like Blood-C and The Girl Who Leapt Through Time, shines through in this edition.

Presented by Ivrea in the same B6 format as the original Japanese release, this edition features a stunning color palette and a captivating storyline that will transport readers to a world where destiny and connection intertwine. With each volume intricately crafted to deliver 600 pages of fantastical storytelling, this set is a must-have for manga enthusiasts and fans of the "Your Name" universe.

Experience the magic and beauty of "Your Name" in a whole new light with this exquisite manga series set. Embrace the adventure, cherish the bonds, and lose yourself in a tale that transcends time and space. Indulge in the allure of this enthralling series and add it to your collection today!

FAQs about our service

How long does it take to ship my product?▼

Shipping times depend on each vendor. The estimated delivery time to our warehouse is 2 to 10 business days. Once received, we will proceed to package and prepare it for international shipping from Latin America to your address. The transit time varies depending on the destination, ranging from 3 to 14 business days.

How can I track my order once it has been shipped?▼

You can track your package effortlessly 24/7. Once your order has been shipped, you will receive a confirmation email with your tracking number so you can easily monitor the status of your shipment in real-time. We collaborate with leading international courier services, ensuring you receive accurate and timely updates throughout the shipping process.

Do you have any return or refund policy?▼

Absolutely! We strive to ensure your complete satisfaction with every purchase. If your order has not yet been shipped, we're happy to offer a full refund. If you wish to return an order that has already been shipped, please contact us within 24 hours of receiving the package so we can provide you with the return address, and we will refund the cost of the product. Our hassle-free return and refund policy is designed to provide you with peace of mind and confidence when shopping with us.

How can I be sure that the products are authentic and of good quality?▼

We select products from well-known and trusted stores and suppliers to ensure we provide the best options and variety. While we make an effort to choose partners who uphold high standards, it is ultimately the responsibility of the store to deliver products in excellent condition and with authenticity guaranteed. In each product description, you can find detailed information about the condition of the product. If, for any reason, the product arrives in a condition different from that mentioned in the listing, we will work closely with you to resolve the issue, allowing you to choose the best course of action. Your satisfaction and trust are our top priorities.

Do I have to pay extra import taxes and duties?▼

No, you don't need to pay any additional taxes or duties. All applicable taxes and charges are included at checkout based on your package's characteristics and your city's regulations. We've simplified the purchasing process for you.

How is the shipping price calculated?▼

Shipping prices are based on each product's weight and destination city in your cart. Shipping prices include a base rate which varies by location, plus an additional variable weight-based rate. For convenience, if your cart contains products from multiple origins, shipping prices will be consolidated at checkout.

Can I contact customer service if I have any questions or issues with my order?▼

"Yes, sure! We are here for you 7 days a week to ensure you have a seamless shopping experience. You can reach us through our contact page or via our live chat. Your satisfaction is our priority, and we are committed to providing you with the best support."
